        ' Date : 3/15/2011
        ' Purpose : This subprocedure pops value from the end of an array.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Array--The array from which value must be removed. This argument must be passed by reference.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

        ' Parameters:
        ' * Array--The array to which value must be added. This argument must be passed by reference.

      • Public Function ConvertCollectionToVariant(colValues As Collection) As Variant

        Public Function ConvertCollectionToVariant(colValues As Collection) As Variant
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : ConvertCollectionToVariant
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 6/23/2011
        ' Purpose : This method converts a collection to an array.
        ' Note that this function does not retain the collection keys as VBA arrays do not support keys.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Collection--The collection that contains the values.
        ' Returns: Variant
        ' * Array--The array that contains the values.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Function GetArrayFromRange(rngSource As Range) As Variant

        Public Function GetArrayFromRange(rngSource As Range) As Variant
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : GetArrayFromRange
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 3/15/2011
        ' Purpose : This function converts given column range or row range to an array.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Source range--The column range or row range which needs to be converted to array.
        ' Returns: Variant
        ' * Array--That contains all values from range.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Function HayStackHasNiddle(vntValues As Variant, sVal As String, Optional bIgnoreCase As Boolean = True) As Boolean

        Public Function HayStackHasNiddle(vntValues As Variant, sVal As String, Optional bIgnoreCase As Boolean = True) As Boolean
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : HayStackHasNiddle
        ' Author : Nitin Dhaware
        ' Date : 6/2/2011
        ' Purpose : This function loops through a given collection or array of strings and checks whether value was found in it or not.
        ' It allows for both case sensetive and case insensetive comparisans.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Collection or array of strings--That contains the strings constituting the hay stack.
        ' * Search String--That is niddle to be searched for in the hay stack.
        ' * Optional case check--A boolean flag that indicates whether the comparisans between niddle and hay stack should be case sensetive or case insensetive.
        ' Returns: Boolean
        ' * True--When the match is successful.
        ' * False--When the match is not found.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

      • Public Function IsEmptyArray(vntArray As Variant) As Boolean

        Public Function IsEmptyArray(vntArray As Variant) As Boolean
        Details:

        '---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        ' Procedure : IsEmptyArray
        ' Author : Siddhant Chothe
        ' Date : 3/16/2011
        ' Purpose : This function checks whether an array passed as argument is empty or not.
        ' Parameters:
        ' * Array--The array that will be checked whether empty or not.
        ' Returns: Boolean
        ' * True--When array is empty.
        ' * False--Otherwise.
        '------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------
